title: Bharat Bhise welcomes two veteran bankers to join the Capsave Finance Board - ANI News
content: Bharat Bhise welcomes two veteran bankers to join the Capsave Finance Board  ANI News
description: Mumbai (Maharashtra) [India], March 28 (ANI/NewsVoir): Capsave Finance Pvt. Ltd., a systemically important non-banking finance company (NBFC) providing leasing and financing solutions announced the appointment of Messrs ADM Chavali and Abraham Chacko to its Board of Directors.
